note.p: Education: MA; DCL (McGill and Queen's University, Canada)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series A 1913 vol 88 pp x-xi signed by W M H
References: R W Home, 'The Royal Society and the Empire: the colonial and Commonwealth Fellowship. Part 2. After 1847' in NR 2003 vol 57 pp 47-84
F C Moon, 'Robert Willis and Franz Reuleaux: pioneers in the theory of machines' in NR 2003 vol 57 pp 209-230
